content.question: The Great Mosque of Djenn√© is situated next to a marketplace for which of the following reasons?

choices.label: To reinforce colonial French authority over Malian culture
To emphasize its role as an epicenter of religious and cultural life
To support the mosque through commercial industry
To reference ancient Roman complexes such as the Forum of Trajan

content.answer: To emphasize its role as an epicenter of religious and cultural life

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain how and/or why context influences artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, and/or function in the creation or meaning of a work of art (or group of related works of art).
